job.overview: We are looking for an experienced Head Chef to join our team in Paris, France. As Head Chef, you will be responsible for the day-to-day operations of the kitchen staff and will oversee the meal preparation and serving of food. You will be responsible for developing the menu and training staff on proper techniques and safety guidelines. You will also collaborate with other departments on special events and specials.
requirements: 4+ years of experience as a head chef or kitchen manager in a high-end or high volume restaurant.
Able to lead and manage a team of kitchen staff and implement effective team structure.
Ability to develop innovative dishes with complex flavors and visual appeal.
Demonstrable experience with inventory control and recipe development.
Knowledge of food safety and sanitation regulations as well as local laws concerning the hospitality industry.
Exceptional communication, problem-solving, negotiation, organization, and leadership skills
Ability to remain professional in a high-pressure situation.
job.contact: Interested candidates should submit their resumes and cover letters to test@theemail.com. Please mention “Head Chef - Paris, France” in the subject line.
